title: tldr-hodl
author: tldr-hodl
content: Hi,satoricoin.jp seems down and I can't find the info anywhere else...Do anyone have a copy of btckey020000.pdf or can point to another way/site I can get public address from Satori chip serial number?

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: tldr-hodl on August 05, 2023, 10:15:40 AMHi,satoricoin.jp seems down and I can't find the info anywhere else...Do anyone have a copy of btckey020000.pdf or can point to another way/site I can get public address from Satori chip serial number?Mj shared this in the satori thread - https://www.dropbox.com/s/qzre64jq5j7mr86/Satori.pdf?dl=0

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: Fantastic, thank you!!I just love this place...Quote from: owlcatz on August 05, 2023, 10:50:52 AMMj shared this in the satori thread - https://www.dropbox.com/s/qzre64jq5j7mr86/Satori.pdf?dl=0
